definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The scope and definition of loanwords in Chinese language has been long discussed.
sentences.chinese: 在漢語外來詞的範圍及定義方面久存爭論。

sentences.english: Monosyllabic loanwords constitute only a small proportion of the Chinese loanwords.
sentences.chinese: 漢語藉詞中，單音節外來詞只佔一小部分。

sentences.english: One of the conspicuous phenomenons of it is full of a lot of English words.
sentences.chinese: 網絡語言中一個突出現象是大量英語外來詞雜糅其中。

sentences.english: Although "sofa" is a loanword, everyone knows its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 沙發”是個外來詞，但大家都知道它的意思。

sentences.english: In all of English loan words, three-syllable English loan words are the most.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的英文外來詞中，三音節詞的數量是最多的。

sentences.english: Letter-words is a kind of loan words absorbed by contemporary Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 字母詞語的出現是現代漢語吸收外來詞的一條途徑。

sentences.english: The thesis defines the concept and presents the formation of foreign word and foreign morpheme briefly.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡單界定了外來詞與外來詞詞素的概念和形成。

sentences.english: The thesis defines the concept and presents the formation of foreign word and foreign morpheme briefly.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡單界定了外來詞與外來詞詞素的概念和形成。

sentences.english: The first part from different views classifies and analyses English loan-words.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分從不同角度對英語外來詞進行分類和分析。

sentences.english: Foreign words keep coming into English.
sentences.chinese: 外來詞源源不斷地進入英語。

sentences.english: Use of loanword so as to create novelty.
sentences.chinese: 借用外來詞，達到新穎的效果。

sentences.english: Finally, the author presumes the developmental tendency of loanwords in the future.
sentences.chinese: 最後筆者從謎米學的角度預測了外來詞的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: At last , it expatiated the new trend of loanword in modern chinese.
sentences.chinese: 通過對比，闡述了現代漢語外來詞的新動向。

sentences.english: An increase in the employment of loanwords is certainly the result of the constant international communication.
sentences.chinese: 外來詞的增加現象正是這種國際間的交流頻繁的結果。

sentences.english: Some of the long words in English dictionaries are imports from other languages.
sentences.chinese: 英語詞典中有些長詞系外來詞。

sentences.english: They are all influenced by loanwords and most of them are abbreviated.
sentences.chinese: 其特點是受外來詞影響而產生，大都經過縮略過程。

definition: Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
